editionStmt.edition: Newly correctid and amendid. The author desireth that the reader will content himself with this first book vntill he may haue leasure to set furth the next, wiche shalbe by Gods grace shortly.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs of W. Köpfel?],

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Gardiner, Stephen. A traictise declaryng and plainly provyng, that the pretensed marriage of priestes, and professed persones, is no mariage, but altogether unlawful, and in all ages, and al countreies of Christendome, bothe forbidden, and also punyshed.
Printers conjectured by STC; publication date from colophon.
